Class for describing basic sockets. More...

void usock::BaseSocket::setTimeout ( double  timeout = 0.0  )  throw ()

Set a timeout (in seconds) on the socket.

Parameters:
timeout Second we're going to wait. It's a double value, so you can specify decimal digits to have a granularity precision bigger than the seconds
